role.argrole: thing that is lost due to arg0

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 至少)) (VP (VRD (PU 「) (VV 震) (PU 」) (VV 掉)) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (NP-PRD (QP (ADVP (AD 近)) (QP (CD 百亿) (CLP (M 元)))) (NP (NN 台币))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 纺织品) (NN 订单))))))
example.arg: *OP* *T*-1 近 百亿 元 台币 的 纺织品 订单
